name: Zombie Cross
description:
A zombie apocalypse begun and you must kill everything in your path to be survivor, Now our world is hostile, everybody have become zombie, the race for be a survivor begins, annihilates all zombie to save the world, the only hero here is you and your bike, all cities are infected with zombies, also all the zombie mountains and zombie volcanic area of the world, will soon explore other like the glaciers, deserts and more areas of the world.

DESCRIPTION

this is top new free game zombie cross, a new experience in motocross game in which you must pass obstacles as blades, volcanoes, bombs, and your worst enemy zombie, which will be per dozen, zombie cross will show a variety of special effects you only need that come to appreciate and several worlds in which you will be blown in cross zombie you'll have to be a survivor to save the world from the zombie apocalypse, but not only a survivor but as a fighter to achieve your goals and achievements.

-----

FEATURES:

action

- More than 5000 zombie to kill!

- More than 7 bikes and upgradeable!

- Table top ten Leaderboard!

playability

- Explore the world zombie city, zombie mountain and zombie volcan!

- Backflip and Frontflip!

- Roads in 45 different levels of action!

- 3 types of enemies type zombie!

- be the top in the multiplayer game!

- be a survivor in zombie cross.

- free to play.

Go and Fun!

zombie,survivor,apocalypse,motorcycle, and more.

Share and follow us

This game is free to download and free to play but some game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
